allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(TransferenciaEmbrioes\): extract types and data loading hook

- Create src/lib/types/transferenciaEmbrioes.ts with all interfaces
- Create src/hooks/useTransferenciaEmbrioesData.ts with data loading logic
- Also commit useLotesFIVData.ts from previous refactoring

This is phase 1-2 of TransferenciaEmbrioes refactoring

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Ajustar base path para deploy na raiz

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: resumo diário AI do Gene + logout mobile

- Edge Function daily-summary \(Gemini 2.0 Flash, JSON structured output\)
- Hook useDailySummary com cache diário e regeneração
- Componente HomeDashboardClienteAI substitui dashboard tradicional
- Botão logout fixo no rodapé do menu lateral mobile \(admin/operacional\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(camera\): integrar EmbryoCamera ao pipeline de upload de vídeos

Mover EmbryoCamera para src/components/camera/ e criar wrapper
CameraRecorder que abre em Dialog full-screen, converte Blob→File
e faz upload via useEmbryoVideoUpload. Botão de câmera adicionado
ao lado do upload de arquivo em VideoUploadButton.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
